import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import ContainerDefault from "~/components/layouts/ContainerDefault"; import HeaderDashboard from "~/components/shared/headers/HeaderDashboard"; import { connect, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { toggleDrawerMenu } from "~/store/app/action"; import { addProduct } from "~/store/product/action"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { fetchCategory } from "~/store/category/action"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import { actionGetSingleMechant } from "~/store/merchant/action"; const ViewUser = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [productCategory, setProductCategory] = useState([]); const router = useRouter(); const type = router.query.type; const id = router.query.user; const { merchantDetails, singleMerchantGetLoading } = useSelector( (state) => state.merchant ); let details, content; useEffect(() => { if (type === "merchant") { dispatch(actionGetSingleMechant(id)); } else if (type === "consumer") { dispatch(actionGetSingleCustomer(id)); } dispatch(toggleDrawerMenu(false)); dispatch(fetchCategory()); }, [type, id]); const { category, cateGetLoading, productPostLoading } = useSelector( (state) => state.category ); if (!singleMerchantGetLoading) { if (type === "merchant") { details = merchantDetails.account; } else if (type === "customer") { details = customerDetails.account; } content = (
); } return (
{content} {/* PRODUCT IMAGE */}
{/* PRODUCT FEATURES */} {/* */}
Back {/* */}
); }; export default connect((state) => state.app)(ViewUser);
